opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Sprietsma, Administrator of the Estate of Sprietsma, Deceased v. Mercury Marine, a Division of Brunswick Corp

opinion:
536 U.S. 921

SPRIETSMA, ADMINISTRATOR OF THE ESTATE OF SPRIETSMA, DECEASED
v.
MERCURY MARINE, A DIVISION OF BRUNSWICK CORP.

No. 01-706.

Supreme Court of the United States.

June 17, 2002.

1

Sup. Ct. Ill. [Certiorari granted, 534 U. S. 1112.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
